name: Animals Match - Fun Animal Connect Dots Game For Kids
name_original: Animals Match - Fun Animal Connect Dots Game For Kids
description:
Connect matching animals with a line to create a match.
Pair all animals, and make sure to cover the entire board to solve each level in Flow Animals.

Animals Match is an addictive yet simple puzzle game.

Be careful when you draw the line, not to cross another, or the line will be cut!

Play through hundreds of levels. Animals Match is easy to learn and control, but can be challenging as you advance in levels.

Animals Match features:
* 5 different animal packages to pick from: Home Pets, Farm Animals, Wild Animals, Sea Animals and a special Dinosaur set.
* Total of 600 Unique Levels, 120 in each set.
* Wide range of difficulty levels - from 5x5 grid to 10x10 grid. Each for his own challenge level.
* Easy to control, even for small kids
* Advance in rank as you solve more puzzles
* Beautifully drawn animals in vivid HD Graphics
* Interactive animals sound effects, Positive and pleasant feedback.
* 3 Hints for each level to ease your play
* Control the game music, sound effects from the settings menu

Animals Match is a wonderfull puzzle game for all ages. Kids will improve their skills while having fun! Adults will enjoy a simple yet challenging and engaging game.

* Great for all ages!
* The game contains a single In App Purchase to unlock all levels.
* The first 5 levels are open for free. If you like this game and would like to purchase all levels, you can unlock the rest of the levels by tapping one of the locked levels.

Thanks for your support!
Tiltan Games Team
http://tiltangames.com/
